alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 2:31PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester and northeastern Franklin Counties through 300 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Montague, or 7 miles southeast of Greenfield, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor nuisance flooding of typically flood prone areas. Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Orange, Deerfield, Montague, Sunderland, Northfield, Bernardston, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury, Colrain, Gill, Whately, Wendell, Warwick and Leyden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester; Western Franklin
